rows.label: tev071501_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071501_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Min'barac about young Orphe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071501_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071501_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Min'barac if anything is troubling him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071501_MSG0001
rows.name:
We've been able to use the senirapa water you brought
us to steadily increase our population.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071501_MSG0002
rows.name:
One day, I may also be able to help birth Mira's third
generation of Orphe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071501_MSG0003
rows.name: Of course, that's only possible if I survive myself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071501_MSG0004
rows.name:
Many of this new generation quickly ended up being
eaten by indigens or dying in other unfortunate
accidents.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071501_MSG0005
rows.name:
That is how powerless we truly are. And to those like
myself, who possess no particular talents,
simply surviving is a considerable challenge.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071501_MSG0009
rows.name: I was born from Sun'barac.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071501_MSG0010
rows.name:
Now I must confront the question of how to survive
on this harsh world.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071501_MSG0011
rows.name:
I do not possess the knowledge or technological
prowess of the other Orpheâ€”and of course,
I possess no physical strength.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071501_MSG0012
rows.name:
At this rate, I would estimate my odds of dying in the
near future are roughly 96 percent.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071501_MSG0013
rows.name:
Perhaps I should seek the counsel of other powerless
xenoforms who have managed to survive on this world.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071501_SEL1011
rows.name: Ask Min'barac about the way Orphe think.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071501_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Min'barac about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071501_MSG0014
rows.name:
I used to consider the way BLADEs form teams based
on individual initiative to be the height of inefficiency.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071501_MSG0015
rows.name:
Surely it would make more sense to have BLADE's
leaders assign members to appropriate teams based on
statistical breakdowns of their abilities?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071501_MSG0016
rows.name:
But now that I see how companions team up on the
basis of personal compatibility, I finally understand.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071501_MSG0017
rows.name:
One would much rather put their life in the hands of
a teammate who values them as a companion,
regardless of ability level.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071501_MSG0022
rows.name:
Thank you, [ST:playername ]!
Thank you for all that you've done for me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071501_MSG0023
rows.name:
I may have failed to acquire the art of controlling
beasts, but I did manage to acquire some wonderful
companions.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071501_MSG0024
rows.name:
Now there's even talk of us all joining BLADE in order
to form a team together![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071501_MSG0025
rows.name:
Ever since I divided from Sun'barac, all I've wanted
is to find a means to ensure my survival.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071501_MSG0026
rows.name:
It's strange, but...now that I have, it feels as though
I've discovered something more important to life than
survival itself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071501_MSG0027
rows.name:
Could this be what you call "relationships"?
They feel somehow as precious as the Ovah within me.[ST:wait ]
